document_data.name: Chalavon Narthiir
document_data.mainbody: '''Chalavon Narthiir''' was a male [[Prostitute|companion]] who worked at the [[Dryad's Dreams]] of [[Mosstone]] in [[Tethyr]].
document_data.Description: Chalavon was slender and graceful, a strong contrast for [[Ardogh Stonegrip]], a fellow courtesan and a mountainous man.
document_data.History: Chalavon was one of the male escorts who worked at Dryad's Dreams in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], along with several men and women who offered their services and companionship at the only festhall in Mosstone. Chalavon's skills laid in his wit and sharp mind who could out-speak a sage. He was a talented [[chess]] player who rarely lost at the game.
